about.title: About
about.p1: Frontend-oriented full stack web developer, self-taught, with strong product and automation skills.
about.p2: Used to working without traditional academic framework, I compensate with fast learning ability, pragmatic approach, and regular deployment of real projects.

devexperience.role: Développeur Web Full Stack · Projets freelance & produits web

leads.title: Lead Generation Platform
leads.description: Design and development of a showcase website with <highlight>interactive questionnaire</highlight> for project estimation. Implementation of a <highlight>Next.js backend</highlight> for reception, <highlight>processing and automation of leads</highlight> to Notion. Deployment on Vercel.

umai.title: E-commerce Platform — Umaï
umai.description: Advanced Shopify integration and configuration. <highlight>Frontend customization with Liquid</highlight>. Connection with external tools (emails, automations) and <highlight>user journey optimization</highlight>.

faceplastie.title: E-learning Platform — Faceplastie
faceplastie.description: Setup and customization of LearnWorlds platform. External tools integration and management of a database with over 2,000 subscribers. <highlight>Complex LMS migration with user data preservation.</highlight>

api.title: Lead Ingestion API
api.description: Development of a <highlight>REST API</highlight> dedicated to collecting and processing leads from external platforms (Malt, Codeur.com). <highlight>Data normalization and communication with main backend.</highlight>

accomplishments.A: Client-facing role with structured milestones and decision points
accomplishments.B: Engagements on complex industrial projects for enterprise clients
accomplishments.C: Creation of technical documentation and proofs of concept
accomplishments.D: Collaboration with cross-functional teams under strict standards and norms
accomplishments.E: Strong focus on quality, consistency, and production constraints

autodidact.title: Self-taught web development journey
autodidact.description: official documentation, real projects, production deployment

additional.title: Additional Information
items: Strong autonomy and fast learning ability
Product sense and business value orientation
Comfortable in environments without traditional academic framework
